A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the second film\, not the final film. It bears no responsibility to explain the secrets laid out in the first. I wouldn't be surprised to learn more about Snoke in the next episode\, and I also wouldn't be surprised if Kylo lies about Rey's origins - it's not like he had much motivation to tell the truth. This was a great film and it is irresponsible of fans to punish it for not servicing their every need. I'll definitely be seeing it again!
